author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four youths have been detained for allegedly possessing tusk. On information, Deputy Superintendent of Police, Valliyoor, Balaji seized 2-feet-long tusk from R. Manikandan (31) and his friend M. Krishna (38), both from Kaavalkinaru under Panagudi police station limits on Monday and handed them over to forest personnel for investigation.

When they grilled the duo, it led to the detention of Selvakumar of Pushpavanam near Panagudi and Shankar of Thandupaththu near Udangudi in Tuticorin district. Further investigation is on.
title: Four held with tusk
